name: Haters
description:
Dive into the stylized world of HATERS to release hate into other players with third-person shooter combat. Unlock hate weapons get back those players that buy skins. Enjoy 4 different modes alone or with friends. Download for free today and build your hate.



Multiplayer or Single Game Modes:
-Conquest
-Capture the flag
-Rush
-Team Deathmatch
-Deathmatch
